meanings.sent1: The overaggressive dog barked loudly at every passerby.
meanings.sent2: The coach warned the player to tone down his overaggressive behavior on the field.
meanings.sent3: The overaggressive squirrel kept stealing nuts from the other animals, thinking it was a game.
meanings.sent4: Her overaggressive driving style made her seem like a race car driver on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The overaggressive sales tactics of the salesman made customers uncomfortable.

meanings.sent1: The overaggressive wrestler tackled his opponent with unnecessary force.
meanings.sent2: The overaggressive marketing campaign alienated potential customers.
meanings.sent3: The overaggressive toddler demanded all the toys in the playroom, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The overaggressive storm clouds darkened the sky, signaling an impending downpour.
meanings.sent5: The overaggressive negotiations between the two countries led to a tense standoff.
